basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Erwinia herbicola (IC50=25 µg/ml), Escherichia coli (IC50<2.5 µg/ml), Pseudomonas putida (IC50<2.5 µg/ml), Pseudomonas syringae (IC50<2.5 µg/ml), Salmonella typhimurium (IC50=65 µg/ml), Serratia sp. (IC50<2.5 µg/ml).Fungi:Candida albicans (IC50=5 µg/ml), Cryptococcus neoformans (IC50<2.5 µg/ml), Saccharomyces cerevisiae (IC50=3 µg/ml), Aspergillus flavus (IC50=60 µg/ml), Fusarium culmorum (IC50=68 µg/ml).
